channel.title: CVE Feed for Benjamin Rojas -- WP Editor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Benjamin Rojas -- WP Editor

item.title: CVE-2024-24700|2024-03-27T05:48:27.636Z -- Benjamin Rojas -- WP Editor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Benjamin Rojas WP Editor allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Editor: from n/a through 1.2.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-25591|2024-03-17T16:14:33.113Z -- Benjamin Rojas -- WP Editor
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Benjamin Rojas WP Editor.This issue affects WP Editor: from n/a through 1.2.7.
